rules_text:
Artifact creature cards in your hand without dormant have dormant. Their dormant cost is equal to their mana cost reduced by {2}. This effect cannot reduce a cost to less than one mana. [i](You may cast it for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
Whenever Diligent Animator deals combat damage to an opponent, choose a noncreature artifact you control with power and toughness. That artifact becomes a creature.
